io.goobi.viewer.servlets.rest.iiif.presentation

Class CollectionResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.goobi.viewer.servlets.rest.iiif.presentation.AbstractResource
      • io.goobi.viewer.servlets.rest.iiif.presentation.CollectionResource
  • Deprecated. 
    use CollectionsResource instead

    @Path(value="/iiif/collections")
 @Deprecated
public class CollectionResource
extends AbstractResource
    IIIF REST resource providing a collection object as defined in the IIIF presentation api
    Author:
    Florian Alpers

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods Deprecated Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      javax.ws.rs.core.Response getCollection(String collectionField, String topElement)
      Deprecated. 
      Returns a iiif collection of the given topCollection for the give collection field The response includes the metadata and subcollections of the direct child collections.
      javax.ws.rs.core.Response getCollections(String collectionField)
      Deprecated. 
      Returns a iiif collection of all collections from the given solr-field The response includes the metadata and subcollections of the topmost collections.
      javax.ws.rs.core.Response getCollectionsWithGrouping(String collectionField, String groupingField)
      Deprecated. 
      Returns a iiif collection of all collections from the given solr-field The response includes the metadata and subcollections of the topmost collections.

      Deprecated. 
      Returns a iiif collection of the given topCollection for the give collection field The response includes the metadata and subcollections of the direct child collections.

    • Method Detail

      • getCollections

        @GET
 @Path(value="/{collectionField}")
 @Produces(value="application/json")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response getCollections(@PathParam(value="collectionField")
                                                                                                                             String collectionField)
                                                                                                                      throws PresentationException,
                                                                                                                             IndexUnreachableException,
                                                                                                                             URISyntaxException,
                                                                                                                             ViewerConfigurationException,
                                                                                                                             de.unigoettingen.sub.commons.contentlib.exceptions.IllegalRequestException
        Deprecated. 
        Returns a iiif collection of all collections from the given solr-field The response includes the metadata and subcollections of the topmost collections. Child collections may be accessed following the links in the @id properties in the member-collections Requires passing a language to set the language for all metadata values
        Parameters:
        collectionField - a String object.
        Returns:
        a Collection object.
        Throws:
        PresentationException - if any.
        IndexUnreachableException - if any.
        URISyntaxException - if any.
        ViewerConfigurationException - if any.
        de.unigoettingen.sub.commons.contentlib.exceptions.IllegalRequestException

        Returns a iiif collection of all collections from the given solr-field The response includes the metadata and subcollections of the topmost collections. Child collections may be accessed following the links in the @id properties in the member-collections Requires passing a language to set the language for all metadata values

      • getCollection

        @GET
 @Path(value="/{collectionField}/{topElement}")
 @Produces(value="application/json")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response getCollection(@PathParam(value="collectionField")
                                                                                                                                         String collectionField,
                                                                                                                                         @PathParam(value="topElement")
                                                                                                                                         String topElement)
                                                                                                                                  throws IndexUnreachableException,
                                                                                                                                         URISyntaxException,
                                                                                                                                         PresentationException,
                                                                                                                                         ViewerConfigurationException,
                                                                                                                                         de.unigoettingen.sub.commons.contentlib.exceptions.IllegalRequestException
        Deprecated. 
        Returns a iiif collection of the given topCollection for the give collection field The response includes the metadata and subcollections of the direct child collections. Collections further down the hierarchy may be accessed following the links in the @id properties in the member-collections Requires passing a language to set the language for all metadata values
        Parameters:
        collectionField - a String object.
        topElement - a String object.
        Returns:
        a Collection object.
        Throws:
        IndexUnreachableException - if any.
        URISyntaxException - if any.
        PresentationException - if any.
        ViewerConfigurationException - if any.
        de.unigoettingen.sub.commons.contentlib.exceptions.IllegalRequestException

      • getCollectionWithGrouping

        @GET
 @Path(value="/{collectionField}/{topElement}/grouping/{groupingField}")
 @Produces(value="application/json")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response getCollectionWithGrouping(@PathParam(value="collectionField")
                                                                                                                                                                              String collectionField,
                                                                                                                                                                              @PathParam(value="topElement")
                                                                                                                                                                              String topElement,
                                                                                                                                                                              @PathParam(value="groupingField")
                                                                                                                                                                              String facetField)
                                                                                                                                                                       throws IndexUnreachableException,
                                                                                                                                                                              URISyntaxException,
                                                                                                                                                                              PresentationException,
                                                                                                                                                                              ViewerConfigurationException,
                                                                                                                                                                              de.unigoettingen.sub.commons.contentlib.exceptions.IllegalRequestException
        Deprecated. 
        Returns a iiif collection of the given topCollection for the give collection field The response includes the metadata and subcollections of the direct child collections. Collections further down the hierarchy may be accessed following the links in the @id properties in the member-collections Requires passing a language to set the language for all metadata values
        Parameters:
        collectionField - a String object.
        topElement - a String object.
        groupingField - a solr field by which the collections may be grouped. Included in the response for each BrowseDcElement to enable grouping by client
        Returns:
        a Collection object.
        Throws:
        IndexUnreachableException - if any.
        URISyntaxException - if any.
        PresentationException - if any.
        ViewerConfigurationException - if any.
        de.unigoettingen.sub.commons.contentlib.exceptions.IllegalRequestException
